thread.section_title: TShirt Studio Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of tshirtstudio.com
thread.title: Curli Pj
thread.title_full: TShirt Studio reviewed by Curli Pj

author: Curli Pj
title: Curli Pj
text: This company offers fantastic customer service ordered a cushion for a birthday and I selected the wrong postage option I messaged customer service and they kindly altered it to the one I originally wanted free of charge later in the week for me to find out they had changed it again to a tracked postage meaning that the item arrived with plenty of time! Thanks very much will definitely recommend and use again
